sense.gloss: being put to shame, being outshone, being eclipsed, feeling embarrassed

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑歌↑↓うた↓はプロ↑顔負↑↓|かおま↓け|だ。
sdata.e: Your singing puts professional singers to shame.

sdata.j: あの↑子↑↓こ↓には↑大人↑↓おとな↓も↑顔負↑↓|かおま↓け|だ。
sdata.e: The child puts adults to shame.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑心臓↑↓しんぞう↓には↑顔負↑↓|かおま↓け|だ。
sdata.e: I can hardly hold my own against his daring.
